title: How to make notes for each and every topic mentioned in the Mains UPSC syllabus - Quora
tags: Union Public Service Commission of India

response.answer_text: Honestly making notes is very helpful as you become aware of the topic intensely and the notes are finally prepared by adding adequate information about the respective topic from the different resources. I would suggest you read every topic and then try to find out the content which is available on the internet as well as in the books and then compile both the sources and then prepare a compact note on a topic.

You haven't understood the game. Read and rememberThe way to do it is by making notes or by marking on the book. Don't focus on each and every topic start with what you like, move slowly, you put too much pressure on yourself. You will have notes but not want to revise them. So, yes please focus remember part.
